title: Stephen J. Eglen
text:
Github
  

  
  
I am a Professor of Computational Neuroscience in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Theoretical Physics. I use computational techniques to investigate development of the nervous system. I co-direct the MPhil in Computational Biology.
ORCID profile 0000-0001-8607-8025.

Office hour
When I am lecturing, I host an office hour, and details will be posted here.







Education
University of Sussex, UK | DPhil in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence | Oct 1993 - June 1997
University of Nottingham, UK | Joint Honours in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence and Psychology | Oct 1989 - June 1993
